description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Grey Infection is an addictive platform game: the environment changes with each action! Shoot at particles, destroy them all! But be careful, each particle has got its own behaviour!  Do you like the challenges? Do you like hard games? Do you want to save the planet, on a futurist world?  Grey Infection is for you!
